summary: Reorganized Instagram section layout: Moved text next to Instagram icon in same container. Changed justify-content to center for text and button containers. Updated dimensions: logo container 145x101px, text container 91x101px, main container 221x101px. Removed padding and margin. Button container now uses justify-content center.
current_status: Instagram section layout reorganized with text next to icon. All justify-content set to center. Dimensions updated. Ready for browser testing.
